effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.emerald: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.colosseum: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.xd: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An attack that is stronger if the TRAINER is disliked.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that is stronger if the TRAINER is disliked.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: This attack move grows more powerful the less the user likes its TRAINER.
